title: 旧约 - 约伯记(Job) - 第 21 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 约伯记(Job) -- 第 21 章 ( 本篇共有 42 章 )

lineList.en: But Job answered and said,
lineList.cn: 约伯回答说，

lineList.en: Hear diligently my speech, and let this be your consolations.
lineList.cn: 你们要细听我的言语，就算是你们安慰我。

lineList.en: Suffer me that I may speak; and after that I have spoken, mock on.
lineList.cn: 请宽容我，我又要说话。说了以后，任凭你们嗤笑吧。

lineList.en: As for me, is my complaint to man? and if it were so, why should not my spirit be troubled?
lineList.cn: 我岂是向人诉冤，为何不焦急呢。

lineList.en: Mark me, and be astonished, and lay your hand upon your mouth.
lineList.cn: 你们要看着我而惊奇，用手捂口。

lineList.en: Even when I remember I am afraid, and trembling taketh hold on my flesh.
lineList.cn: 我每逢思想，心就惊惶，浑身战兢。

lineList.en: Wherefore do the wicked live, become old, yea, are mighty in power?
lineList.cn: 恶人为何存活，享大寿数，势力强盛呢。

lineList.en: Their seed is established in their sight with them, and their offspring before their eyes.
lineList.cn: 他们眼见儿孙，和他们一同坚立。

lineList.en: Their houses are safe from fear, neither is the rod of God upon them.
lineList.cn: 他们的家宅平安无惧。神的杖也不加在他们身上。

lineList.en: Their bull gendereth, and faileth not; their cow calveth, and casteth not her calf.
lineList.cn: 他们的公牛孳生而不断绝。母牛下犊而不掉胎。

lineList.en: They send forth their little ones like a flock, and their children dance.
lineList.cn: 他们打发小孩子出去，多如羊群。他们的儿女踊跃跳舞。

lineList.en: They take the timbrel and harp, and rejoice at the sound of the organ.
lineList.cn: 他们随着琴鼓歌唱，又因箫声欢喜。

lineList.en: They spend their days in wealth, and in a moment go down to the grave.
lineList.cn: 他们度日诸事亨通，转眼下入阴间。

lineList.en: Therefore they say unto God, Depart from us; for we desire not the knowledge of thy ways.
lineList.cn: 他们对神说，离开我们吧。我们不愿晓得你的道。

lineList.en: What is the Almighty, that we should serve him? and what profit should we have, if we pray unto him?
lineList.cn: 全能者是谁，我们何必事奉他呢。求告他有什么益处呢。

lineList.en: Lo, their good is not in their hand: the counsel of the wicked is far from me.
lineList.cn: 看哪，他们亨通不在乎自己。恶人所谋定的离我好远。

lineList.en: How oft is the candle of the wicked put out! and how oft cometh their destruction upon them! God distributeth sorrows in his anger.
lineList.cn: 恶人的灯何尝熄灭。患难何尝临到他们呢。神何尝发怒，向他们分散灾祸呢。

lineList.en: They are as stubble before the wind, and as chaff that the storm carrieth away.
lineList.cn: 他们何尝像风前的碎秸，如暴风刮去的糠秕呢。

lineList.en: God layeth up his iniquity for his children: he rewardeth him, and he shall know it.
lineList.cn: 你们说，神为恶人的儿女积蓄罪孽。我说，不如本人受报，好使他亲自知道。

lineList.en: His eyes shall see his destruction, and he shall drink of the wrath of the Almighty.
lineList.cn: 愿他亲眼看见自己败亡，亲自饮全能者的忿怒。

lineList.en: For what pleasure hath he in his house after him, when the number of his months is cut off in the midst?
lineList.cn: 他的岁月既尽，他还顾他本家吗。

lineList.en: Shall any teach God knowledge? seeing he judgeth those that are high.
lineList.cn: 神既审判那在高位的，谁能将知识教训他呢。

lineList.en: One dieth in his full strength, being wholly at ease and quiet.
lineList.cn: 有人至死身体强壮，尽得平靖安逸。

lineList.en: His breasts are full of milk, and his bones are moistened with marrow.
lineList.cn: 他的奶桶充满，他的骨髓滋润。

lineList.en: And another dieth in the bitterness of his soul, and never eateth with pleasure.
lineList.cn: 有人至死心中痛苦，终身未尝福乐的滋味。

lineList.en: They shall lie down alike in the dust, and the worms shall cover them.
lineList.cn: 他们一样躺卧在尘土中，都被虫子遮盖。

lineList.en: Behold, I know your thoughts, and the devices which ye wrongfully imagine against me.
lineList.cn: 我知道你们的意思，并诬害我的计谋。

lineList.en: For ye say, Where is the house of the prince? and where are the dwelling places of the wicked?
lineList.cn: 你们说，霸者的房屋在那里。恶人住过的帐棚在那里。

lineList.en: Have ye not asked them that go by the way? and do ye not know their tokens,
lineList.cn: 你们岂没有询问过路的人吗。不知道他们所引的证据吗。

lineList.en: That the wicked is reserved to the day of destruction? they shall be brought forth to the day of wrath.
lineList.cn: 就是恶人在祸患的日子得存留，在发怒的日子得逃脱。

lineList.en: Who shall declare his way to his face? and who shall repay him what he hath done?
lineList.cn: 他所行的，有谁当面给他说明。他所做的，有谁报应他呢。

lineList.en: Yet shall he be brought to the grave, and shall remain in the tomb.
lineList.cn: 然而他要被抬到茔地，并有人看守坟墓。

lineList.en: The clods of the valley shall be sweet unto him, and every man shall draw after him, as there are innumerable before him.
lineList.cn: 他要以谷中的土块为甘甜，在他以先去的无数，在他以后去的更多。

lineList.en: How then comfort ye me in vain, seeing in your answers there remaineth falsehood?
lineList.cn: 你们对答的话中既都错谬，怎吗徒然安慰我呢。
